title: The Whispering Library
author: Ava Chen
synopsis: An archivist unearths a banned manuscript; every reader disappears after turning the final page.

title: Solar Winds: A Voyager's Guide
author: Marco Velas
synopsis: Explains heliophysics and solar storms with field notes from spacecraft engineers.

title: Gardens of Silence
author: Lena Moreau
synopsis: A botanist returns to her coastal hometown to restore a salt-battered conservatory and reconcile with her brother.

title: El Viaje de la Llama
author: Sofía Rojas
synopsis: Una joven pastora persigue a su llama sagrada a través de montañas nevadas y descubre un linaje olvidado.

title: Data Sketches for Storytellers
author: Priya Kulkarni
synopsis: Practical recipes for narrative visualizations with examples in notebooks and dashboards.
